mapper.sql: ID, CODE, LIABLEID, PERSION_LIABLE, MENUTYPE, USEDATE, FK_ORGID, FK_OUTDETAILID, QTY, PERCENT, REMARK, STATUS, CREATOR, CREATEDATE, LASTOPUSER, LASTOPDATE
mapper.select: select a.CODE,a.LIABLEID,a.MENUTYPE,a.PERSION_LIABLE,b.INDATE,b.WAREHOUSE,c.LIABLEPERSON as OUTLIABLEPERSON, b.INTERVALDATE,b.USELIFEDATE,a.REMARK,a.LASTOPUSER,a.LASTOPDATE,a.USEDATE,b.PRODATE,a.QTY,a.PERCENT,a.CREATEDATE, a.CREATOR from FOOD_ADDITIVE a LEFT JOIN BVOUCHER_DETAIL b on a.FK_OUTDETAILID = b.ID LEFT JOIN BVOUCHER_INDEX c on c.id = b.FK_INDEXID where a.code =#{code} and a.STATUS = 0
mapper.insert:
insert into FOOD_ADDITIVE
ID,
CODE,
LIABLEID,
PERSION_LIABLE,
MENUTYPE,
USEDATE,
FK_ORGID,
FK_OUTDETAILID,
QTY,
PERCENT,
REMARK,
STATUS,
CREATOR,
CREATEDATE,
LASTOPUSER,
LASTOPDATE,

#{liableid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{persionLiable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{menutype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

#{fkOrgid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update FOOD_ADDITIVE
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LIABLEID = #{liableid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERSION_LIABLE = #{persionLiable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MENUTYPE = #{menutype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USEDATE = #{usedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FK_ORGID = #{fkOrgid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FK_OUTDETAILID = #{fkOutdetailid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QTY = #{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PERCENT = #{percent,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LASTOPUSER = #{lastopuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LASTOPDATE = #{lastopdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update FOOD_ADDITIVE set CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LIABLEID = #{liableid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERSION_LIABLE = #{persionLiable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENUTYPE = #{menutype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, USEDATE = #{usedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FK_ORGID = #{fkOrgid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FK_OUTDETAILID = #{fkOutdetailid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QTY = #{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PERCENT = #{percent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LASTOPUSER = #{lastopuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTOPDATE = #{lastopdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into FOOD_ADDITIVE (ID, CODE, LIABLEID, PERSION_LIABLE, MENUTYPE, USEDATE, FK_ORGID, FK_OUTDETAILID, QTY, PERCENT, REMARK, STATUS, CREATOR, CREATEDATE, LASTOPUSER, LASTOPDATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liableid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{persionLiable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menutype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{usedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fkOrgid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fkOutdetailid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{percent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastopuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastopdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
